'''''Amon Hen'' 234''' is the two-hundred-and-thirty-fourth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in [[March]] [[2012]].

* Cover: ''[[:Image:AmonHen234.jpg|Rendezvous at the Green Dragon]]''

** By: Ian Collier
